Fancy Pants Adventure: World 3 – Play the Stylish Hand-Drawn Platformer Online

Fancy Pants Adventure: World 3 is the third major entry in Brad Borne’s iconic Flash platformer series. Players once again control Fancy Pants Man as he embarks on a new adventure to rescue his sister, Cutie Pants, who has been kidnapped by the mischievous Angry Bathtub Pirates. Combining smooth parkour mechanics, responsive combat, and fluid animation, this game represents the peak of the series’ evolution.

What is Fancy Pants Adventure: World 3?

In Fancy Pants Adventure: World 3, players explore hand-drawn levels filled with obstacles, enemies, and collectibles. The game expands its momentum-based platforming with combat mechanics that let you fight enemies using over 40 different melee weapons. Players can also discover hidden rooms, complete microtrials, and collect stars to unlock new costumes, making every run a unique experience.

How to Play Fancy Pants Adventure: World 3

  • Move: Use the arrow keys to run left or right.
  • Jump: Press [S] to jump and perform flips.
  • Slide/Crouch: Hold [Down Arrow] to slide down slopes or dodge attacks.
  • Attack: Press [A] to use melee weapons and defeat enemies.
  • Objective: Rescue Cutie Pants, defeat the pirates, and collect hidden stars.
